itemDescription: rugby union international who represented Scotland from 1947 to 1953

wikipedia_page.main: James 'Hamish' Cooper Dawson (29 October 1925 – 19 October 2007) was a rugby union international who represented Scotland from 1947 to 1953 gaining 20 caps.

response: * Hamish Dawson (1927–2007), Scotland rugby union international.
* James Hamish Dawson (19252007), Scottish rugby union player
